title: RestauraHub
features: It is a restaurent website which I named as RestauraHub. Here a user can add any recipe from any category. User can pay the food. It is a admin panel website that have a lot of conditional statements. It have more to see. User needs to login or signup first to add to cart the recipe. Many more to see in this simple user friendly restaurent website.

title: CareerCanvas
features: Company can share their job offers . Also can Delete and update the job info
User can apply for the job and author can get a email
Category wise jobs and Filtering, searching system also Authentican system with google and admin dashboard
